title: How to Watch President Trump's Speech to Congress
text:
Donald Trump is set to deliver his first address to Congress at 9 p.m. Eastern on Tuesday night. It will be available to watch on all major networks. You can also live stream it via PBS NewsHour. 
CBS, NBC, ABC, Fox, PBS, Univision, CNN, Fox News, MSNBC, C-SPAN, etc. Related Red-State Progressives Hold the Blueprint for the Trump Resistance Liberals in conservative states know a thing or two about fighting back against single-party rule by bigots 
In his speech, which is expected to last over an hour, the president will seek to highlight the issues he's made a priority in his first two months in office, like the recent crackdown on illegal immigration. Three family members of Americans killed by undocumented immigrants will attend the event as Trump's guests, sitting with Melania Trump in the First Lady's box. 
White House senior policy adviser Stephen Miller, author of Trump's Republican National Convention speech and his inaugural address and one of the key figures behind the disastrous travel ban, wrote the majority. (A revised version of the contentious executive order is expected to debut tomorrow.) Former Kentucky Gov. Steve Beshear will deliver the Democrats' response. More News
